price: 26 Nous avons, en vérité, créé l’homme[688] d’une argile desséchée et sonore, tirée d’un limon noir et malodorant,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
